query.sql: SELECT L.x, L.y, R.y, R.z, T.a FROM L FULL OUTER JOIN R ON L.y = R.y LEFT OUTER JOIN T ON L.y = T.a WHERE L.x > R.z
SELECT 'qgm(true)' as qgm, * FROM t1 a1 LEFT JOIN t1 a2 ON TRUE AND a1.f1 = a2.f1 LEFT JOIN t2 ON TRUE WHERE a1.f1 = a2.f1 AND a2.f2 = a1.f1 AND a2.f1 = a1.f2 AND a2.f1 < a1.f2 AND a2.f2 = 5
SELECT 'qgm(true)' as qgm, L.x, L.y, R.y, R.z, T.a FROM L FULL OUTER JOIN R ON L.y = R.y LEFT OUTER JOIN T ON L.y = T.a WHERE L.x > R.z
SELECT 'qgm(true)' as qgm, * FROM table_f4_f5 RIGHT JOIN table_f5_f6 USING (f5) WHERE TRUE AND f5 = f4
SELECT L.x, L.y, R.y, R.z FROM L LEFT OUTER JOIN R ON TRUE
SELECT 'qgm(true)' as qgm, * FROM orders FULL OUTER JOIN customer ON ( c_acctbal = o_totalprice ) WHERE c_acctbal + o_totalprice = 123 AND c_acctbal = o_totalprice
SELECT L.x, L.y, R.y, R.z FROM L INNER JOIN R ON L.y = R.y WHERE L.x < R.z
SELECT L.x, L.y, R.y, R.z FROM L LEFT OUTER JOIN R ON L.y = R.y
SELECT 'qgm(false)' as qgm, * FROM table_f4_f5 RIGHT JOIN table_f5_f6 USING (f5) WHERE TRUE AND f5 = f4
SELECT "qgm(true)" as qgm, * FROM t1 a1 LEFT JOIN t1 a2 ON TRUE AND a1.f1 = a2.f1 LEFT JOIN t2 ON TRUE WHERE a1.f1 = a2.f1 AND a2.f2 = a1.f1 AND a2.f1 = a1.f2 AND a2.f1 < a1.f2 AND a2.f2 = 5
SELECT 'qgm(false)' as qgm, * FROM table_f1_f2_f3 LEFT JOIN (table_f3_f4_f5 RIGHT JOIN table_f5_f6 USING (f5)) USING (f3) WHERE TRUE AND f5 = 0
SELECT 'qgm(true)' as qgm, L.x, L.y, R.y, R.z, T.a FROM L FULL OUTER JOIN R ON L.y = R.y LEFT OUTER JOIN T ON L.y = T.a WHERE L.x > R.z
SELECT 'qgm(false)' as qgm, * FROM orders FULL OUTER JOIN customer ON ( c_acctbal = o_totalprice ) WHERE c_acctbal + o_totalprice = 123 AND c_acctbal = o_totalprice
SELECT 'qgm(false)' as qgm, L.x, L.y, R.y, R.z, T.a FROM L FULL OUTER JOIN R ON L.y = R.y LEFT OUTER JOIN T ON L.y = T.a WHERE L.x > R.z
SELECT 'qgm(false)' as qgm, * FROM t1 a1 LEFT JOIN t1 a2 ON TRUE AND a1.f1 = a2.f1 LEFT JOIN t2 ON TRUE WHERE a1.f1 = a2.f1 AND a2.f2 = a1.f1 AND a2.f1 = a1.f2 AND a2.f1 < a1.f2 AND a2.f2 = 5
SELECT L.x, L.y, R.y, R.z, T.a FROM L LEFT OUTER JOIN R ON L.y = R.y
SELECT L.x, L.y, R.y, R.z FROM L FULL OUTER JOIN R ON L.y = R.y
SELECT 'qgm(true)' as qgm, * FROM table_f1_f2_f3 LEFT JOIN (table_f3_f4_f5 RIGHT JOIN table_f5_f6 USING (f5)) USING (f3) WHERE TRUE AND f5 = 0
SELECT L.x, L.y, R.y, R.z FROM L FULL OUTER JOIN R ON L.y = R.y WHERE L.x < 42
SELECT 'qgm(false)' as qgm, * FROM orders, customer WHERE c_acctbal + o_totalprice = 123 AND c_acctbal = o_totalprice
SELECT 'qgm(false)' as qgm, * FROM orders INNER JOIN customer ON ( c_acctbal = o_totalprice ) WHERE c_acctbal + o_totalprice = 123 AND c_acctbal = o_totalprice
